<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/guides/{guide-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete a guide. Successful request will return `204 No Content`.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
